name: Melory's Song
description:
Brief Description

Melory's Song is a short narrative game with a message.

You play as a dog, looking to cheer up your owner by discovering pieces of music from his past.

Credits

Created by Wesley Cats, Olimpia Di Nella, Joost Rol and Matteo Ugrote.

This project was designed and realized in 2 weeks for a game jam at BUAS.

Download Instructions

Simply unzip the download file and run the executable.

NOTE: the current build is not the final build of the game, as it is still in development.
